ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    A notification object that has a Type (So the factory knows how to make the Notificatoin), a message containing pertinent information, and info about who to send to and who sent the notification. The actual sending of the notification is done through elastic search and a polling system that uses the hasSeen Boolean to check if the notification is new or not and based on that make a new Android Notification notifying the user things have occurred in Tasko. Notifications are created in a various of scenarios.
    See Also:
    NotificationList, AndroidNotificationCreator, DataManager

                    NotificationType Type)
        Default constructor for the Notification Class
        Parameters:
        message - Message containing pertinent information
        recipient - A string representing the user the notification will be sent too.
        sender - A string representing the user that sent the notification.
        taskID - The id of the task the notification is related too
        Type - The Type of Notification
        See Also:
        NotificationType

      • getHasSeen

        public java.lang.Boolean getHasSeen()
        Used for polling. In the database, if a Task is seen, hasSeen will return false and the Notification will trigger an android Notification to be created. Otherwise, It is ignored.
